attributes.action: Ensure that the British EU budgetary contribution will be zero
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain is currently the EU's #2 sponsor, second only to Germany (because the German economy is much bigger), but will by the EU's #1 financial sponsor by 2010. This is unfair.
Spain, a wealthy country, is the EU's principal net beneficiary.
Italy, whose economy is roughly as big as ours and is as populated as our country, contributes 33% less than we do.
France, whose populace is bigger (and let's not forget that the French economy is roughly as big as ours) is a net beneficiary because of the CAP.
We therefore demand that the Treasury ensures that we don't pay the EU more than we get for it.
